Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to you regarding JUnit tests tutorials. I am c=
urrently studying informatics at University of West Bohemia in Pilsen, and =
while browsing=C2=A0https://github.com/junit-team/junit/wiki/Getting-starte=
d=C2=A0I discovered that very basic instructions on how to start using JUni=
t tests are quite brief. My supervisor has some tutorials for beginners; ho=
wever, they are in Czech - not very useful for the rest of the world. I was=
 thinking of perharps filling in this gap - I probably would be able to pre=
pare a consistent introduction based on materials provided.=C2=A0Could it b=
e useful for you? If so, I would appreciate some starting tips (suitable/re=
commended tools for writing, formating standards etc.)

RegardsTereza S.
